data.name: Hidden Shapes Old West - Wallpapers
data.detailed_description:
Amazing arts inspired in the Old West specially designed to transmit tranquility and make you delight.

Let the desktop of your computer with a unique look!

There are 6 images with 3840 x 2160 pixels and Ultra Wide (2560 x 1080 pixels).

After downloading this add-on will be available in the directory where the game “Hidden Shapes Old West” is installed, by default, it is (...\Steam\steamapps\common\ Hidden Shapes Old West \ Hidden Shapes Old West - Wallpapers).
